00034 /*
00035  * $Log$

00043 
00044 #include <sys/timer.h>
00045 #include <dev/watchdog.h>
00046 
00047 /*
00048  * Start the hardware watch dog timer.
00049  */
00050 uint32_t NutWatchDogStart(uint32_t ms, uint32_t xmode)
00051 {
00052 #if defined(__AVR__)
00053     return AvrWatchDogStart(ms);
00054 #elif defined(MCU_AT91R40008)
00055     return At91WatchDogStart(ms, xmode);
00056 #else
00057     return 0;
00058 #endif
00059 }
00060 
00061 /*
00062  * Re-start the hardware watch dog timer.
00063  */
00064 void NutWatchDogRestart(void)
00065 {
00066 #if defined(__AVR__)
00067     AvrWatchDogRestart();
00068 #elif defined(MCU_AT91R40008)
00069     At91WatchDogRestart();
00070 #endif
00071 }
00072 
00073 /*
00074  * Disable the hardware watch dog timer.
00075  */
00076 void NutWatchDogDisable(void)
00077 {
00078 #if defined(__AVR__)
00079     AvrWatchDogDisable();
00080 #elif defined(MCU_AT91R40008)
00081     At91WatchDogDisable();
00082 #endif
00083 }
00084 
00085 /*
00086  * Enable the hardware watch dog timer.
00087  */
00088 void NutWatchDogEnable(void)
00089 {
00090 #if defined(__AVR__)
00091     AvrWatchDogEnable();
00092 #elif defined(MCU_AT91R40008)
00093     At91WatchDogEnable();
00094 #endif
00095 }
